bottomSheet.locationAccessDesc: Recha kwitavizwa kwa habali kumulola malevi ga kuja kwikena inzira tsa hano hari veyu no kulonda inzira yakufi ku ofisi yino
bottomSheet.viewAllOptions: Lola Ma Options Gosi Ga Lwendo
bottomSheet.confirmOffice: Avandu vagakwitisha navo ofisi yino iri chimali
bottomSheet.within500m: Ukumanyiswa kuvera mu mita 500 tsa ofisi
bottomSheet.locationNotStored: Habali yaveyu ya chimali sivikwi haha
bottomSheet.distanceAway: Uri mita {{distance}} kure Kihuma iza hafi mu mita {{maxDistance}} tsa ofisi kumulikwitisha
bottomSheet.confirmationFailed: Gutwama kwa gukwitisha Kihuma keresa navindi
bottomSheet.locationPermissionRequired: Kumulikwitisha kutsindirwa kwitavizwa kwa habali Kihuma recha kwitavizwa kwa habali no kukeresa navindi
bottomSheet.tapForGoogleMaps: Tsindira ofisi kwa inzira tsa Google Maps
bottomSheet.coordinatesCopied: Ma coordinates ga copy mu clipboard

layers.standardDesc: Mulori gwa kawaida gwa map ya inzira
layers.iebcOfficesDesc: Ofisi tsosi tsa IEBC hu Kenya yosi
layers.constituenciesDesc: Mipakano ya parliamentary na electoral hu Kenya yosi chivusi chi define na IEBC Kila polygon yimelera constituency yimwenga na code na itsa lyayo
layers.healthcareFacilities: Tsi Facilities tsa Vurwari mu Kenya
layers.healthcareFacilitiesDesc: Mugaruro gwa tsi facilities tsa vurwari hu ichalo yosi data inene muno nga yitunga kuduku kucha kulitaviza
layers.counties: Tsilori tsa Va Voters Va Tsi Counties Tsa Kenya
layers.countiesDesc: Mugaruro gwa mipakano ya tsi counties hu ichalo yosi
layers.myLocationDesc: Lolesa habali yaveyu ya karunu ku map
layers.aboutLayersDesc: Garura ma layers on na off kwa kuvaza map yaveyu Mungavaza ma data layers mamingi na ma base maps gandi kwa mulori gunzanzu

contribute.title: Vika Habali ya Ofisi Yitsireku
contribute.description: Durizeni ku map ofisi tsosi tsa IEBC hu Kenya yosi khu kuvika tsilori tsa habali tsa chimali
contribute.officeName: Itsa Lya Ofisi Sio ya Kumanyisa
contribute.officeNamePlaceholder: Ku mulori Ofisi ya IEBC Westlands
contribute.googleMapsPlaceholder: Paste link ya Google Maps ama ma coordinates
contribute.uploadEvidenceDesc: Foto ya ofisi signage ama habali yakuzereveta yiduriza mukwitisha
contribute.dragDropOrClick: Kokora no kudonyesa ama tsindira ku upload
contribute.movePin: Kokora pin ku adjust habali ya chimali
contribute.submissionSuccessDesc: Chimuvika chaveyu chitumiwi navindi chiyilolwa na va moderators
contribute.submissionNote: Mulori Gukwitisha kwa ndavanu guduriza kukoresa chimali Asande kwa kuvika
contribute.errorLocation: Kihuma vika ma coordinates ga habali ya ofisi
contribute.errorInvalidCoordinates: Ma coordinates gasichimali Kihuma lola latitude na longitude navindi
contribute.errorLocationPermission: Kwitavizwa kwa habali kuviziwe Kihuma recha kwitavizwa kwa habali
contribute.errorLocationFailed: Gutwama kwa kulitaviza habali Kihuma keresa ku injiza ma coordinates na muvoko
contribute.parseError: Format sivurahi Kihuma paste link ya chimali ya Google Maps ama ma coordinates

uber.uberXDesc: Malwendo ga kila idiku ga kuvarizi
uber.comfortDesc: Motoka tsinyeya na mahali mamingi ga migulu
